data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mironov, Sergey V., Ehrnsberger, Rainer, Dabert, Jacek (2014): New species of the feather mite genus Protolichus Trouessart, 1884 (Astigmata, Pterolichidae) from lories and lorikeets (Aves: Psittaciformes). Zootaxa 3774 (2): 131-151, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3774.2.2
